alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 1:15PM MDT until June 23 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding along Box Elder Creek is expected because of recent heavy rains over the last two days. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following counties, Adams and Weld. This is for Box Elder creek from Bootleg Reservoir to Klug Reservoir. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 115 PM MDT, Weld County emergency management reported high water along Box Edler Creek that is expected to increase after recent rains. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
